data.text: Ezɨ Agripa kamaghɨn Pol mɨgei, “Nɨ uabɨ uabɨ geghan.”
“Atrivim Agripa, kɨ Judaba na gasir akar kam ikarvaghasa. Ezɨ bar dera kɨ an gun nɨ mɨkɨmam.
E Judaba, nɨ en araziba ko bizir e mɨgɨa uari adoziba nɨ bar a dagh fo. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ nɨn azai, nɨ nɨmɨra daperagh ikɨ nan akaba baragh.

“Judaba me bar na gɨfo, kɨ aghɨrimra itir dughiamɨn, kɨ uan nguibamɨn uan adarazir ko ikegha, gɨn ghua Jerusalemɨn iti.26:4 Pol, dughiar aghɨrimra itimɨn, a Tarsusɨn nguibar Silisian Provinsɨn itimɨn iti. Nɨ akar Aposel 22:3ɨn itimɨn gan.

26:5 Aposel 22:3; 23:6; 24:15; 24:21; Filipai 3:5Me fomɨra na gɨfo, egh me ifongegh, nan arazibar gun nɨ mɨkɨm. Kɨ uan igiamɨn ikia, Farisibar gumazir mamɨn otogha men arazibar gɨn zui. Ezɨ gumaziba men arazibar gɨn mangan bar iburaghburaki.
“God fomɨra en ovaviba ko akar dɨkɨrɨzir mam gami. Ezɨ kɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim akar kamɨn ikiava a bagha datɨrɨghɨn kotɨn iti.

Ezɨ kar Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim, en 12plan anababa, me Godɨn ziam arueba ko dɨmagaribar a fe, egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikia bizir kam baghavɨra mɨzuai. O Atrivim, e bizir kam bagha mɨzuai, ezɨ bizir kamɨn, Judaba a bagha akaba na gasi.
“Manmaghɨn amizɨ ia gumazir maba ghaze, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim God ikian kogham, a gumazamizir oveaghuezibar amutɨ me ua dɨkavam?
“Fomɨra kɨ uabɨ ghaze, kɨ bizir bar avɨribar amutɨ da Nasaretɨn gumazim Iesusɨn ziam gasɨghasɨgham.

“Egha kɨ bizir kaba Jerusalemɨn dagh ami. Kɨ Godɨn ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba da gavgavim inigha, Kraisɨn adarazir avɨriba isa kalabus garɨki. Ezɨ gumazir dapaniba me mɨsoghtɨ me aremeghasa me mɨgeima, kɨ uaghan ghaze, me aremegham.

Egha dughiar avɨriba kɨ God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar aven ghua, men suigha me mɨsosi. Kɨ kamaghsua, me Iesusɨn ziam akar kurabar a mɨkɨm, egh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn ikian kogham. Nan navim me bagha puv nan isi, ezɨ kɨ nguibar saghon itibar ghua me gasɨghasɨghasa me buri.”
Egha Pol mɨgɨa ghua ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ezɨ darorir kabar mam, kɨ Godɨn ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba da akar gavgavim ini, ezɨ me na amadazɨ kɨ Damaskusɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghu.

O Atrivim, dughiam kamaghɨn 12 kloghɨn zuima, kɨ tuavimɨn ghua gari, angazangarir mam Godɨn Nguibamɨn ikegha izaghiri. Angazangarir kam bar gavgavigha, aruemɨn angazangarim gafiragha, na ko zui darazi bar e gisira.

Ezɨ e bar nguazim gire, egha kɨ orazima akar mam Hibrun akamɨn kamaghɨn na mɨgei, ‘Sol, Sol, nɨ manmaghsua na gasɨghasɨghavɨra iti? Kɨ nɨn akurvaghasava amima, nɨ nan akurvazim tɨvagha, uabɨ osɨmtɨzim uabɨ ganɨdi.’
“Ezɨ kɨ an azara, ‘Ekiam, nɨ tina?’
26:16 Aposel 22:15Nɨ dɨkavigh tugh. Kɨ nɨ amɨseveghtɨ, nɨ nan ingangarim damuasa, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨ bato. Ezɨ bizir datɨrɨghɨn otozir nɨ ganiziba ko bizir kɨ gɨn nɨn akakaghamiba, nɨ dar gun mɨkɨmam.
26:17 Aposel 22:21Eghtɨ kɨ nɨn ganɨva nɨn akurvagham, eghtɨ nɨn gumazamiziba ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba pazɨ nɨ damighan kogham. Kɨ me bagha nɨ amadi,

26:18 Aisaia 35:5; 42:7; 42:16; Jon 8:12; Aposel 20:32; 2 Korin 6:14; Efesus 2:2; Kolosi 1:13eghtɨ nɨ men damaziba kuightɨma, me akɨrim ragh mɨtatemɨn arazir kurabagh asaragh, angazangarimɨn izɨ. Egh me Satanɨn atrivir gavgavim ateghɨva, God bagh izɨ. Kamaghɨn kɨ men arazir kuraba gɨn amangtɨ, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itir gumazamizibar tongɨn danganim iniam. Nan gumazamizir kaba, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itima, kɨ me gamizɨ me zue. Nɨ ingangarir kam damuasa, kɨ me bagha nɨ amadi.’ ”
Egha Pol ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Atrivim Agripa, kɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn izezir irebamɨn mɨn bizimɨn ganigha an aghuazir puvatɨ, kɨ an akam baraki.

26:20 Matyu 3:8; Aposel 9:20; 9:28-29; 11:26; 13:14Egha kɨ faragha Damaskusɨn nguibamɨn akam akuni, egha Jerusalemɨn akam akunigha, Judan nguibaba bar dar akam akurava, uaghan Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba sara akam me mɨkɨra ghaze, ‘Ia uan navibagh iragh ua God bagh izɨ. Eghtɨ ian arazir ia amiba, ian gun mɨkɨm suam, ia navibagh iragha gɨfa.’
26:21 Aposel 21:30-31Kɨ bizir kabar akam akurima, Judaba na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremeghasa, me Godɨn Dɨpenir avɨzibar nan suira.

26:22 Luk 24:27; 24:44; Jon 5:46; Rom 3:21God nan akurazɨ kɨ deragha ikia iza datɨrɨkɨn, egha kɨ kagh tughav ikia akam me mɨgei, gumazir kɨniba ko gumazir ekiaba me bar. Akar kamra, Moses ko Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba fomɨra an gun mɨkeme. Kɨ uam akar igharazitam akuri puvatɨ.

26:23 Aisaia 42:6; 49:6; Luk 24:26; 24:44-47; 1 Korin 15:20; Kolosi 1:18Me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, Gumazir God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezim, Krais, a mɨzazim inigh aremegh, egh faraghɨvɨra ovevemɨn dɨkavighamin gumazimɨn otogham. Egh, a Godɨn angazangarimɨn gun Israelia ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav kɨmam.”
Pol akam akuravɨra itima, Festus a dagaragha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Pol, nɨ ongani! Nɨ suren avɨribagh amizɨ, da nɨ gamima nɨ ongani!”
Ezɨ Pol kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Gumazir Aruam Festus, kɨ onganizir puvatɨ, kɨ guizbangɨra mɨgei, kɨ nɨghnɨzim ikiava kɨ mɨgei.
26:26 Jon 18:20Ezɨ Atrivim Agripa bizir kaba bar dagh fo, da modogha otozir puvatɨ, ezɨ kɨ fo, bizir kaba a gitazir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ atiatir puvatɨgha dar gun bar Atrivim Agripa mɨgei.
Atrivim Agripa, nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar iti, o puvatɨ? Kɨ fo, nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim iti.”
Ezɨ Agripa kamaghɨn Polɨn azara, “Nɨ ghaze, nɨ ti dughiar otevir kamɨn na damightɨ, kɨ Kraisɨn anavɨn otogham, o?”

Ezɨ Pol a ikaragha ghaze, “Dughiar otevim o dughiar ruarim, kɨ kamaghɨn God ko mɨkɨmam, nɨ ko karasi ia datɨrɨghɨn nan akam baraki, ia bar nan mɨn otivigham. Ezɨ bizir vamɨra, me senbar ia ikegh ia isɨ kalabus darɨghan, kɨ aghua.”
Ezɨ Atrivim ko gavmanɨn dapanim ko Bernaisi ko gumazir me ko ikeziba, me dɨkavigha,
26:31 Aposel 23:9; 23:29; 25:25dɨpenim ategha ghua, uarira uariv gɨa ghaze, “Gumazir kam arazir kuratam damighɨva, an aremegham, o a kalabusɨn ikiam. An arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ.”
Ezɨ Agripa kamaghɨn Festus mɨgei, “A uabɨ ghaze, Sisar nan kotiam baragham. A ti kamaghɨn mɨkemezir puvatɨgha, fɨriaghɨrɨghai.”
